document.full_text: a decorated flight nurse who won reinstatement to the u.s. air force reserves in a landmark court challenge of her expulsion for revealing she is a lesbian said on tuesday she will retire rather than return to duty.
document.title: lesbian air force nurse to retire rather than rejoin
lines_and_colors: a decorated flight nurse who won reinstatement to the u.s. air force reserves in a landmark court challenge of her expulsion for revealing she is a lesbian said on tuesday she will retire rather than return to duty.
